q: Is this action codeblock 1) a step towards resolving the problems identified in the orientation block 2) simple 3) with appropriate tool use?
description: An action block that defines a function 'add_mansion_description' to add a descriptive paragraph about the mansion to the 'horror.txt' file. The function uses the 'editor-/app/horror.txt' tool to append the description to the file. The action is added to the weave-agent with the title 'Add descriptive paragraph about the mansion' and referencing the function name add_mansion_description.
